name: Magnetic Separator
overview: Magnetic separator is one of the most important sperating machine in mineral beneficiation industry. Due to the physical-property difference, magnetic separator include many kinds models, such as high intensity separator, low intensity separator and some other models.
feature: Key parts are well prevent from being corroded through optimized design

application: Magnetic separator is suitable for wet separating of magnetite, magnetic pyrite, baking ore, and limonite, etc.It also can be used for removing Fe procession of coal, nonmetallic mineral and construction materials.
